title: Hundreds of years after the first try, we can finally read a Ptolemy text
description: The original writing was hidden in part by a 19th century attempt to read it.

title: Fox News to pay Dominion $788 million in settlement, ending defamation trial
description: Dominion: Settlement provides vindication after "torrent of lies" on Fox News.

title: FDA authorizes spring COVID boosters for older adults, immunocompromised
description: The original monovalent COVID-19 mRNA shots are no longer authorized in the US.

title: Intel unceremoniously dumps its year-old Blockscale chips for bitcoin mining
description: ASICs were meant to mine "without compromising the supply of new CPUs or GPUs."

title: Xiaomi’s “Ultra” camera phone has a grip accessory, screw-on lens filters
description: The grip has a shutter button, zoom controls, and standard 67 mm lens-filter support.

title: GPT-4 will hunt for trends in medical records thanks to Microsoft and Epic
description: Generative AI promises to streamline health care, but critics say not so fast.

title: That Galaxy Quest TV series might finally be happening
description: But can you even have a successful sequel without the late, great Alan Rickman?

title: Nest 2020 thermostats receive Matter update, which adds Apple Home compatibility
description: Google is still looking into support for the Nest models people actually own.

title: Netflix actor wields DMCA takedowns to block tweets sharing “rapey” clip
description: David Choe claims the 2014 podcast clip detailing a rape is performance "art."

title: Musk feuds with another public broadcaster, labels CBC “69% Government-funded”
description: CBC stops posting on Twitter, says "our journalism is independent."

title: Early testing shows PCIe 5.0 SSDs inch closer to their max potential
description: The T700 is set to be the fastest consumer SSD, but you still don't need it.

title: Proton update gets 18 more Windows games running on Linux, including Chex Quest HD
description: Valve dev calls Proton 8.0 release "our biggest rebase to date."

title: Switch modder Bowser released from prison, likely owes Nintendo for rest of life
description: Team Xecuter member, out early on good behavior, has paid $175 so far.

title: Ultra-rare CS:GO gun reportedly sells for over $400,000
description: Massive sale is part of market-wide price spike ahead of sequel transition.

title: A deep dive into the SCOTUS abortion pill case—and what’s at stake for the FDA
description: The ruling could open the door to "limitless litigation" to overturn FDA approvals.

title: Europe’s Ariane 6 rocket is turning into a space policy disaster
description: Now the Ariane 6 rocket is failing even its most basic task.

title: Apple’s Macs have long escaped ransomware, but that may be changing
description: Malicious encryptors for Apple computers could herald new risks for macOS users.

title: Porsche bumps battery capacity, charging speed for 2024 Cayenne hybrid
description: Battery capacity increases to 25.9 kW, and the electric motor is 30% more powerful.
